attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is being done on behalf of Samantha Moore's Perants who cannot find the right words as last year(March 12th 2006) they both lost their only baby girl at the age of 12. She would have now been 14 but suddenly the day came when her life was taken away from her. She was ran over on a London road and the whole point of the petition is to get as many people as possible to sign it so we can take it to our local council to get something done. If you believe you can help then please sign our petition.
Thankyou Fredi Moore and Kayleigh Walls

rejection.details: The title of a petition needs to be a request for action, rather than a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
